downloadTitle: Estimate Total Economic Impact of your ERP Investment
downloadDescription: ​​​​Are you about to make an investment decision in a new ERP application and building a business case? Use Forrester's Total Economic Impact report to see where your benefits can co​me from. ​
detailsSection:
Get an idea of the investments needed. In addition, Forrester's approach also takes two more components into account - the risks - this reflects the level of uncertainty that costs and benefits will occur as planned - and flexibility - the ability of the organization to respond to changes in the market. ​ You will find two tools available:
  1. Forrester's TEI report based on interviews with Dynamics AX 2012 customers
  2. TEI estimator that can be used to do a first estimation​.
You can use the values from the study (set as default) or change this to better fit your situation. You can do the estimation in 12 currencies.
